isCharsOnly

public static boolean isCharsOnly(java.lang.String str)
isCharsOnly determines if the following String parameter only contains characters that are letters between a and z and A and Z.
Parameters:
str:Ljava.lang.String - argument in question for characters only check.
Returns:
a boolean value of true if the String parameter only contains characters, false otherwise.

isDigitsOnly

public static boolean isDigitsOnly(java.lang.String str)
isDigitsOnly determines if the following String parameter only contains characters that are numeric digits between 0 and 9.
Parameters:
str:Ljava.lang.String - argument in question for digits only check.
Returns:
a boolean value of true if the String parameter only contains digits, false otherwise.

replace

public static java.lang.String replace(java.lang.String str,
                                       java.lang.String from,
                                       java.lang.String to)
replace replaces all "from" occurences of the specified String in the "str" parameter to the "to" parameter.
Parameters:
str:Ljava.lang.String - the String object in which to replace "from" String occurrences to "to" Strings.
from:Ljava.lang.String - the String to replace.
to:Ljava.lang.String - the String to replace the from String with.
Returns:
a Ljava.lang.String object of the replacement.

trimLeadingZeros

public static java.lang.String trimLeadingZeros(java.lang.String str)
trimLeadingZeros removes any leading zeros from the String representation of the number to prevent the value of the number from being interpreted as an octal value. Note that this method will first call trim() on the String parameter to only work with digits.
Parameters:
str:Ljava.lang.String - representation of an integer value containing leading zeros.
Returns:
a Ljava.lang.String representation of the integer parameter value without leading zeros.
Throws:
Ljava.lang.NumberFormatException - if the value represented by the String is not a n integer value.
